#  Collaboration -- MBA TECH 

URL: https://mba.agh.edu.pl/collaboration
Crawled: 2025-03-19 22:40:53

Skip to content

Skip to footer

 Collaboration 

At MBA TECH, we understand the importance of practical, industry-relevant education

That's why we've partnered with the biggest and most innovative companies in the TECH industry to provide our participants with a world-class educational experience.

Teaching Team Members

MBA TECH collaborates with experienced CEOs, managers and business professionals from various industries. Our team members have worked with international corporations across the globe and have been instrumental in their success. They know what it takes to succeed in the TECH industry, and they're here to help you do the same.

Prof. Andrzej Ożadowicz
Faculty of Electrical Engineering, Automatics, Computer Science, and Biomedical Engineering
